description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝第二子，清代唯一一位在皇帝生前被公开册立的皇太子，后两度被废。死后被雍正帝追封为和硕理密亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the second son of the Kangxi Emperor, and the only crown prince to be publicly proclaimed during an emperor's lifetime in the Qing dynasty. He was later deposed twice. Posthumously granted the title of Prince Limi of the First Rank by the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，清朝定都北京后第二位皇帝。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the second Qing emperor to rule over China proper.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的第一任皇后，胤礽的生母。
description.en: The first empress consort of the Kangxi Emperor and the birth mother of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，康熙帝第四子，胤礽的弟弟。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor, and the younger brother of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝大臣，曾任皇太子胤礽的师傅。
description.en: A minister of the Qing dynasty who served as a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝大臣，曾任皇太子胤礽的师傅。
description.en: A minister of the Qing dynasty who served as a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝大臣、理学家，曾任皇太子胤礽的师傅。
description.en: A minister and Neo-Confucian scholar of the Qing dynasty who served as a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝大臣、理学家，曾任皇太子胤礽的师傅。
description.en: A minister and Neo-Confucian scholar of the Qing dynasty who served as a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，曾任皇太子胤礽的师傅。
description.en: An official of the Qing dynasty who served as a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝皇长子，与皇太子胤礽关系紧张。
description.en: The eldest son of the Kangxi Emperor, who had a tense relationship with Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 准噶尔汗国可汗，曾与康熙帝作战。
description.en: Khan of the Dzungar Khanate, who fought against the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与准噶尔汗国之间的一场战役。战前康熙帝患病，太子胤礽侍疾时表现冷漠，成为父子关系破裂的开端。
description.en: A battle between the Qing dynasty and the Dzungar Khanate. Before the battle, the Kangxi Emperor fell ill, and Crown Prince Yunreng's indifferent attitude while attending to him marked the beginning of the rift in their father-son relationship.

description.zh-cn: 法国传教士，在其著作中高度评价皇太子胤礽。
description.en: A French Jesuit missionary who spoke highly of Crown Prince Yunreng in his writings.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第三位皇帝，康熙帝之父。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty, father of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝外戚，孝诚仁皇后之父。
description.en: An imperial relative by marriage during the Qing dynasty, father of Empress Xiaochengren.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝嫡长子，胤礽的同母兄，早夭。
description.en: The eldest legitimate son of the Kangxi Emperor, the full elder brother of Yunreng, who died young.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽的嫡福晋。
description.en: The primary consort of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽的侧福晋，弘皙的生母。
description.en: A secondary consort of Yunreng and the birth mother of Hongxi.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽第二子。
description.en: The second son of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的明清两代皇家宫殿。
description.en: The imperial palace of the Ming and Qing dynasties located in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽是康熙帝的第二子。
description.en: Yunreng was the second son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽是孝诚仁皇后的儿子。
description.en: Yunreng was the son of Empress Xiaochengren.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽是雍正帝（胤禛）的哥哥。
description.en: Yunreng was the elder brother of the Yongzheng Emperor (Yinzhen).

description.zh-cn: 胤礽是承祜的同母弟弟。
description.en: Yunreng was the younger full brother of Chenghu.

description.zh-cn: 自14岁起，胤礽与皇长子允禔关系紧张，在各方面都相互竞争比较。
description.en: Starting from the age of 14, Yunreng had a tense relationship with the eldest prince Yunti, competing with him in various aspects.

description.zh-cn: 瓜尔佳氏是胤礽的嫡福晋。
description.en: Lady Guwalgiya was the primary consort of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 弘晳是胤礽的第二子。
description.en: Hongxi was the second son of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 因对嫡后孝诚仁皇后的宠爱，康熙帝将爱妻之情移转到其子胤礽身上，在其仅一周岁时就册立为皇太子。
description.en: Due to his affection for Empress Xiaochengren, the Kangxi Emperor transferred his love to their son Yunreng, appointing him Crown Prince when he was only one year old.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第一次废黜胤礽的皇太子之位，并将其幽禁于咸安宫。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor deposed Yunreng from his position as Crown Prince for the first time and confined him to Xian'an Palace.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝复立胤礽为皇太子。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor reinstated Yunreng as Crown Prince.

description.zh-cn: 因有人指控胤礽结党营私，康熙帝第二次废黜其皇太子之位。
description.en: Due to accusations of forming cliques for selfish purposes, the Kangxi Emperor deposed Yunreng from his position as Crown Prince for the second time.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽于雍正二年病逝后，雍正帝追封其为和硕理密亲王。
description.en: After Yunreng died of illness in the second year of the Yongzheng reign, the Yongzheng Emperor posthumously granted him the title of Prince Limi of the First Rank.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽六岁时，康熙帝令名儒张英担任其师傅。
description.en: When Yunreng was six years old, the Kangxi Emperor appointed the renowned scholar Zhang Ying as his tutor.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽六岁时，康熙帝令名儒李光地担任其师傅。
description.en: When Yunreng was six years old, the Kangxi Emperor appointed the renowned scholar Li Guangdi as his tutor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝令熊赐履为胤礽教授理学诸书。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor ordered Xiong Cili to teach Yunreng various Neo-Confucian texts.

description.zh-cn: 康熙二十五年，康熙帝任命理学家汤斌为詹事，教导太子胤礽。
description.en: In 1686, the Kangxi Emperor appointed the Neo-Confucian scholar Tang Bin as Expositor to educate Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 康熙二十五年，康熙帝任命耿介为少詹事，教导太子胤礽。
description.en: In 1686, the Kangxi Emperor appointed Geng Jie as Junior Expositor to educate Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 康熙二十九年，康熙帝亲征噶尔丹时患病，太子胤礽侍疾时毫无忧色，此事成为父子情份产生裂痕的起因。
description.en: In 1690, when the Kangxi Emperor fell ill during his personal expedition against Galdan, Crown Prince Yunreng showed no concern while attending to him. This incident became the cause of the rift in their father-son relationship.

description.zh-cn: 法国传教士白晋在其著作《中国皇帝康熙传》中称赞时年23岁的胤礽是一个十全完美的皇太子，并相信他未来能成为像其父一样的伟大皇帝。
description.en: In his work 'Portrait historique de l'empereur de la Chine', the French missionary Joachim Bouvet praised the 23-year-old Yunreng as a flawless crown prince, believing he would one day become a great emperor like his father.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽曾两度被立为清朝皇太子。
description.en: Yunreng was twice installed as the Crown Prince of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 胤礽出生于北京紫禁城。
description.en: Yunreng was born in the Forbidden City, Beijing.
